summary.span: 命名空間提供 Windows Sockets (Winsock) 介面的 Managed 實作 (Implementation) 給需要嚴密控制網路存取的開發人員。

span.span: The namespace provides a managed implementation of the Windows Sockets (Winsock) interface for developers who need to tightly control access to the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和類別會封裝建立 TCP 和 UDP 連線到網際網路的詳細資料。The , , and classes encapsulate the details of creating TCP and UDP connections to the Internet.
